metadata.title: CVE-2023-45924 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: libglxproto.c in OpenGL libglvnd bb06db5a was discovered to contain asegmentation violation via the function glXGetDrawableScreen(). NOTE: thisis disputed because there are no common situations in which users requireuninterrupted operation with an attacker-controller server.

criterions.comment: libglvnd package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
